segments.advisor_message: So, to get started, could you tell me what country you're currently domiciled in? This will help us understand your tax situation better.
segments.client_message: Sure, I’m domiciled in the UK, and I’ve been a resident here for tax purposes as well.

segments.advisor_message: Great, thanks for that. And can you share your current employment status and perhaps your occupation?
segments.client_message: Um, I’m currently employed as a software engineer, and I've been with my employer since June 2019.
